Timelocks.title: Timelocks
Timelocks.managedTimelocksDescription: View and manage your timelock contracts.
Timelocks.create_des: Timelock Protocol provides a full suite of timelock-based tools. You can create a timelock contract on the platform or import an existing, compatible one to securely manage and delay on-chain assets and operations.
Timelocks.import_des: If you already have a timelock contract, you can import it here. Please ensure the contract is compatible with the Timelock Protocol.
Timelocks.addTimelockDescription: Add your timelock contract address for management.

TimelockTable.name: Remark
TimelockTable.title: Timelock
TimelockTable.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the timelock contract "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
TimelockTable.noTimelockContractsDescription: Create or import a timelock contract to get started with secure on-chain operations.

TimelockSummaryCard.creator: Creator
TimelockSummaryCard.executionWindowTooltip: Transaction can be executed between {startValue} {startUnit} and {endValue} {endUnit} after queuing. After that it expires.
